Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.shape.Shape

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
    public class Ball
extends javafx.scene.shape.Circle
    Created by Pawel Kierski on 15/06.2019 Ball class uses for generate fully functional animated ball
